title: Elizabeth Banks, Jorja Fox | Who Wants to Tax a Billionaire?
description:
A proposal to tax the ultra-rich keeps Washington lawmakers fighting over the spending bill in Congress, while Virginia gubernatorial candidate Terry McAuliffe busts a move. Then, find out which companies are getting their beaks wet in the booze industry. Stephen sits down with actor, director, and host of “My Body, My Podcast,” Elizabeth Banks to talk birds and the bees. Next, what happens in “CSI: Vegas” doesn’t stay in “CSI: Vegas,” when star Jorja Fox joins Stephen to discuss the new series.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
